name: Roll20 2022 redesign darker mode
description:
Makes numerous tweaks to roll20's new dark mode. Turn on dark mode before enabling this script, they are meant to work together. 

You can edit the the darkness level and color scheme in the css. Current color scheme is inspired by Emoh's Darkness's theme.
additional_info: Userstyles.org is busted. Use https://uso.kkx.one/style/232357 (immediate updates) or https://userstyles.world/style/3969/roll20-2022-redesign-darker-mode (delayed updates) to install the script.
